item.title: Int i (PI, REP++)
item.dc:creator: @James-RevolutionX James-RevolutionX
item.description:
@James-RevolutionX wrote:

Anyone know the int i’s for;

    [code]addPrayer(int i, 0, 601, 7, 0, "Sharp Eye", HoverId);
    addPrayer(int i, 0, 602, 8, 1, "Mystic Will", 18002);
    addPrayer(int i, 0, 603, 25, 2, "Hawk Eye", 18004);
    addPrayer(int i, 0, 604, 26, 3, "Mystic Lore", 18006);
    addPrayer(int i, 0, 605, 43, 4, "Eagle Eye", 18008);
    addPrayer(int i, 0, 606, 44, 5, "Mystic Might", 18010);
    addPrayer(int i, 0, 607, 59, 6, "Chivalry", 18012);
    addPrayer(int i, 0, 608, 69, 7, "Piety", 18014);[/code]

Where it says int i - is the ints i need. This to help you;

EDIT; I NEED THE HOVERID FOR THESE PRAYERS, NOT THE INT I’S.

(int i, int configId, int configFrame, int requiredValues, int prayerSpriteID, String PrayerName, int Hover)
